The Westminster College Department of Mathematics and Computer Science invites applications for a
tenure-track position as Assistant Professor of Computer Science to begin August 2026.
We seek a dynamic and innovative teacher-scholar who is committed to excellence in undergraduate
education and student-centered learning. All areas of computer science will be considered, though
preference may be given to candidates with expertise in data science, artificial intelligence, or information
security.
